metadata.description: A string with the storage id for the flowlogs to be sent to. The format must be: '/subscriptions/{subscription id}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroup name}/providers/Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/{storage account name}
This needs to use the name format for the region found by running 'az account list-locations' or 'Get-AzLocation'

metaData.description: DeployIfNotExists, AuditIfNotExists or Disable the execution of the Policy
